headline: Europe Data Center Cooling Market Report 2025-2035, with Schneider Electric, Asetek, Submer, Munters, ALFA LAVAL, Condair, Danfoss, Johnson Controls, STLUZ, DCX Liquid Cooling Systems, and Rittal
summary: The Europe data center cooling market is expected to surge from $6.76 billion in 2024 to $20.55 billion by 2035, at a 10.18% CAGR. Key drivers include the growth of data generation, cloud computing, and digital infrastructure, which necessitate efficient cooling solutions to maintain equipment reliability. EU regulations and sustainability goals are pushing the market towards eco-friendly technologies like liquid cooling and direct-to-chip systems. Despite challenges such as high initial investm

headline: JOHNSON CONTROLS EXPANDS YORK速 YVAM AIR-COOLED MAGNETIC BEARING CHILLER TO AUSTRALIA TO MEET GROWING DATA CENTRE DEMAND
summary: Johnson Controls (NYSE: JCI), the global leader for smart, safe, healthy and sustainable buildings, has expanded availability of its industry-leading YORK速 YVAM air-cooled magnetic bearing chillers to Australia, addressing the surging demand for efficient and sustainable cooling solutions for both hyperscale and colocation data centres.
